usp.ime.gclib.sensor.orientation

Class OrientationSensorListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • usp.ime.gclib.sensor.orientation.OrientationSensorListener

  • public class OrientationSensorListener
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a sensor listener to the motion and position sensors: magnetometer, accelerometer and gyroscope
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Renato Avila e Tonny Cordeiro
    See Also:
    SensorEventListener
